Events that occurred on 29 February.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1960 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 222c.
1968 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 301.
1980 - A Reader's Guide to The Silmarillion is published.
2004 - The 76th Academy Awards: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King wins 11 Oscars out of 11 nominations. David Hemmings is featured in the In Memoriam feature.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3019:
Aragorn reaches the Downs.
The Rohirrim attack at sunrise and destroy the Orcs; death of Gárulf, Grishnákh and Uglúk.
Merry and Pippin escape from the Orcs and meet Treebeard.
Treebeard leads the hobbits to Wellinghall and they drink the Ent-draught.
Frodo and Samwise descend from the Emyn Muil and meet Gollum.
Faramir sees the funeral boat of his brother Boromir.
